content: careful to knit the two legs of the double stitches together as one stitch continue with the yoke yoke note when changing skein place the switch next to the chart sts on one of the sleeves setup round k17 17 20 20 22 24 24 27 pm work row 1 from chart or written instruction 27 sts pm k35 35 41 41 45 49 49 55 pm work row 1 from chart or written instruction 27 sts k2tog k to end about the lace pattern when all 16 row of the chart are worked you start over from row 1 as many times as you need for your size the lace pattern varies in number of sts and therefore these sts are not included in the total number of sts moving marker for beginning of round rm k17 17 20 20 22 24 24 27 next marker is now for beginning of round change marker to a different colour if possible round a *sm work next row from chart sm k to m repeat from * once repeat round a another 1 1 1 1 3 3 3 3 times change to longer circular needle when needed round 1 increase *sm work next row from chart sm k5 4 6 4 4 4 2 4 m1r k1 m1r repeat to 6 4 6 5 4 5 3 5 sts before next m k to m repeat from * once 50 56 60 66 76 82 90 94 sts increase 120 126 142 148 166 180 188 204 sts + chart sts work round a another 12 13 13 14 13 14 14 15 times round 2 increase *sm work next row from lace pattern sm k7 5 6 6 5 5 3 5 m1r k2 m1r repeat to 7 6 7 6 6 5 3 5 sts before next m k to m repeat from * once 48 54 60 64 74 82 90 94 sts increase 168 180 202 212 240 262 278 298 sts + chart sts work round a another 12 13 13 14 13 14 14 15 times round 3 increase *sm work next row from lace pattern sm k7 6 7 6 6 5 5 7 m1r k3 m1r repeat to 8 6 7 7 6 6 5 7 sts before next m k to m repeat from * once 48 54 60 64 74 82 88 92 sts increase 216 234 262 276 314 344 366 390 sts + chart sts work round a another 12 13 13 14 13 14 14 15 times round 4 increase *sm work next row from lace pattern sm k8 6 9 7 6 6 5 7 m1r k4 m1r repeat to 8 7 10 7 7 6 6 8 sts before next m k to m repeat from * once 48 54 58 64 74 82 88 92 sts increase 264 288 320 340 388 426 454 482 sts + chart sts work round a another 12
